shopifyPage.title: Request Quote / Purchase Orders
shopifyPage.body:
Thank you for your interest in Motic Instruments. 

Couldn't find your item? Buying from outside of the US? Buying in bulk?

Feel free to send us a request for quote at online@motic-america.com. Our support team will respond to quote requests the same business day placed. In your email include the following information:

  • Name
  • Phone#
  • Email
  • Company/Institution
  • Shipment Address
  • Item / Part # /Quantity (if known)
  • What do you need to view with the microscope?

If you are submitting a purchase order, please send them to online@motic-america.com
